snippet.title: Rain of Reflections - Demo walkthrough, part 2
snippet.description:
In the second part of the walkthrough, director Victor Lionhead gives you insight into the deeper aspects of the encounter and confrontation system, which is entirely centered around a motivation mechanic.

Rain of Reflections: Set Free is out now on PC/Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/695050/Rain_of_Reflections_Set_Free/

Part 1 can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T4ZvmgMpznc

Please note that the game is fully playable, full screen, no borders, in a standard 16:9 picture format as well - we just had the game set to "21:9 cinematic mode" for this recording.
